title: Rengar Plush Icon - Merch Store
body:
I have purchased the Rengar Plush, and whenever I try to redeem the icon that comes with it I get this error message "UNLOCK ERROR An unknown problem has occurred. Please try again in a few minutes." 

And I have been trying to unlock it for an hour or so. I have submitted a ticket, but sometimes they do not get back to me for a week or so and I would really like to get this sorted out asap please!!! {{champion:107}} {{summoner:6}}

replies.body: If it's not working normally then support is pretty much the only way you'll get it resolved. There isn't anything more we can do for you here so you'll have to wait on them.
